Subject: Accounts
whatisaccounting: Process of Identifying  , measuring  , recording , the business transaction and communicating to the interested user.

objectiveofaccounting.one: Maintain record of the business transaction
objectiveofaccounting.four: to make information to various groups and user.

fixedasset: Economic resources of an enterprise that can be usually expressed in montary terms.
revenue: Amounts of money earned by an enterprise by selling goods or by providing services to the customers.
expenses: Cost incurred by a business in the process of earning revenue
